reviews.review_text: Very enjoyable game with interesting 'rage' mechanics. Fights consist of exchanging spells, scaring enemies so that you can pick them off one at a time, taking advantage of their rage and unleashing it against them for mega damage. Very intelligent and original spin on the action rpg.
